attributes.action: Cancel GCSES and A levels for this year
attributes.additional_details: the last time the year 11’s had a full year was year 8 and the last time the current A level holders year was year 10 therefore I believe it is unfair to make them do their exams based on what they have learned as the COVID 19 lockdown affected everyone’s education
attributes.background: I want the government to cancel GCSES and A levels for this year and to give predicted grades
